Digital Innovation and Mobile, IT Director

New event by CSCMP Spain at Barcelona! November, 9th, from 1930hs, at Restaurant Marítim. Networking Dinner with TOP Global Supply Chain Speaker: Rob Haddock "Coca-Cola’s Sales & Operations – Integrated Business Planning Journey", foundational Process for Driving a Competitive Advantage. Book your seat before Monday, 6th. Send an email to contact@cscmpspain.org with reference: TOPGlobalSC2017 (CSCMP Members=55€,  Non Members: 70€) (Speaker will start at 20:15hs & Dinner at 21:15hs)
Leading people, process, and technology improvements making it easier for Point B to sell and easier for our Clients to buy.

Point B is a 20 year old Management Consulting Firm that helps organizations form, execute, and thrive. Our clients come to us for leadership in helping plan for and execute upon their most complex business transformations. 70% of our business comes from repeat clients, and we've been told that we are really good at leaving organizations in a better place then where we found them. We are relentless about driving business results and partner closely with our clients by leveraging the collective industry and functional insights of Point B's 700 Associates.

Helping organizations drive strategic growth through a holistic approach to business management consulting that addresses people, process and technology.  Facilitate, educate, and support clients in achieving outstanding performance through leading practices and the proper alignment/application of technology that creates successful business transformations.

Program and Project Management; Managed delivery through ongoing Roadmap measurement and Program advisory services. Managing Resources, P&L, Executive Relationships, Stakeholder Engagement, Governance Creation and Management, and PMBOK Methodologies.

Helped coordinate projects, deliver, and sell Assessment & Roadmap advisory services to executive level business and IT stakeholders. Responding to unique business challenges through assessment engagements and Roadmap recommendations to align IT with business strategy and design solutions that meet the organizations strategic goals and objectives for growth.
recommendations: Bob MacLeod
Sr. Consultant at AccountabilIT, LLC
November 7, 2016, Sean worked with Bob in the same group

I had the pleasure of working with Sean during the implementation of a complex proprietary software system that was being developed for a client. The software was mission critical operation system and was replacing a legacy system that had limited all growth at the business. Sean was the Project Manager for the replacement system. As the Project Manager Sean worked with the client Project Team and client Steering Committee to ensure all client requirements and concerns were addressed. This included client efforts to dynamically grow the scope of the solution.Sean was highly successful in both keeping the client satisfied and working with the software team to resolve software development issues and keep the project on track. As always there were many moving parts to the project and Sean handled them all successfully and professionally. The project required maintaining a team presence at the out-of-state client site, in-house developers, remote consultants on both coasts, and significant client and company infrastructure changes. Sean provided focus, guidance, and judgment to the project and the results showed.

I have had the privilege of working with Sean for 3 years. Through the several years that we spent together in a professional environment, I have seen Sean grow – both as a program manager and a human being.I have seen him take calculated risks and emerge with successful results. In whichever way the team needed him, he was there from introducing team building activities to testing the application to coordinating with the client. As a pragmatic leader and a realist, he can grasp ideas in a holistic manner and still pay attention to minute details.As a person with passion for profession, Sean is a pleasure to work with. I recommend him for a program manager position at any organization that chooses to take benefit from his diverse skills.

Senior Data Developer at BestIT
September 20, 2016, Eric reported directly to Sean

Two qualities really stand out with Sean: leadership and communication.  I had the privilege of working on a delivery team under Sean for the better part of a year.  During that time, I was particularly impressed by Sean's ability to adapt and redirect the team's efforts in response to change.  This skill is not easily acquired; but it is so natural for Sean  - and his sense of humor and candor were things universally appreciated in tense meetings.  Sean is an adept leader and natural problem solver who has earned my highest recommendation.  He would be a true asset in any leadership position.

summary: Throughout my career I've had the privilege of helping organizations solve some of their largest and most complex business challenges through:•	 Strategic Assessments & Roadmap Creation•	 Program & Project Leadership•	 Organizational Effectiveness & Change Management•	 Business Transformation Readiness & Execution•	 Process Improvement•	 Go-To-Market Strategy & Innovation•	 Technology Evaluation & Selection•	 Business Development & Demand Generation•	 Marketing Integration & New Products
name: Sean Arleth
title: Management Consultant and Owner at Point B
